content: materials - 4 skeins of purl soho s good wool 1 100% undyed andean highland wool each skein is 383 yards approximately 1532 yards required we used the color hickory nut - us 6 4 mm 24- and 40- or 47-inch circular needles 2 note you can use just the 40- or 47-inch needles but they may be a bit unruly at the beginning of the project when you re working only a few stitches gauge 22 stitches and 48 row = 4 inches in garter stitch size - finished length of wingspan 75½ inches - finished length of each short side 52 inches - finished length from cast-on point to middle of bind-off edge 37¾ inches designed for purl soho by joelle hoverson 1 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881
